item.title: About
item.description: About All contents are under CC BY 4.0. Details can be found through the link at the ending of each post. Me Was facinated by Python. Daily job involves Golang, JavaScript.

item.title: Hello
item.description: Hello World! Environment My previous blog platform: WordPress on BandWagon Host high maintainance cost: php, sqldb, virtual host vps is not free, though cheap Current: Hugo + Github free! Golang is promising. I'm learning it by doing it hugo new site [path] git clone [any hugo theme] hugo new posts/any.md hugo serve -D Deploy Using git submodle to make built files pointed to a different origin
